title: Sparkle Car Wash hiring and wage decisions

content.description:
Sparkle Car Wash is a profit-maximizing firm with the following production information.

With which worker is marginal product maximized?

Identify and define the economic principle that explains why marginal product eventually decreases.

Explain why Sparkle would never hire the sixth worker.

If Sparkle charges $6 for washing a car, what is the maximum daily wage that Sparkle would be willing to pay the fourth worker?
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
